name: jp.ign.com
css:
@-moz-document domain("ign.com") {
#adkit_billboard,
.evo-wrapper,
ul.spotlight,
#sidebar,
.blogroll .dailyfixPromo,
.PROMOTED,
img.breakingnews,
div.tabmenu.large,
.tabmenu.small,
.blogroll a.comments,
.blogroll p b,
footer,
#globalnav,
.covercards,
#globalspine .editions,
.disqus,
#side_adkit,
#adkit_footer,
#adkit_article,
div.social_small,
#header
{display:none !important;}

#content
{float:none; width:97%; margin:0 auto; padding:0 0 10px 0px;}

#globalspine a.logo
{margin:0;}

#globalspine,
#globalheader .redbox
{height:34px;}

#main,
.articleHero
{margin:0 auto;}

.article
{margin:0 30px; width:85%;}

.article #id_title
{margin:0; width:100%; line-height:40px;}

body
{background-image:none !important; background-color:white !important;}

.articleBody iframe.video, .articleBody iframe.vplayer,
.articleBody iframe[src*="youtu"], .articleBody iframe[src*="vimeo"]
{height:528px;}

.embeddedgallery
{height:458px !important;}

.blogroll li
{padding: 8px 0 5px 147px;}

.blogroll a.thumb
{top: 6.5px;}
}
